results.title: Le Bois des Amants = Lovers' Grove
results.brief_description:
During WWII, Herta von Stauffen travels to Normandy with a fake Ausweiss and a borrowed uniform to be with her husband for Christmas. She is billeted at Madame Parisot’s whose son, Charles, has joined the British army.

Credits: Producer, Ray Ventura ; director, Claude Autant-Lara ; writers, Albert Husson, Rene Hardy, Jacques Remy ; photography, Jacques Natteau ; music, Rene Cloerec ; art direction, Max Douy.
Cast: Laurent Terzieff, Erika Remberg, Francoise Rosay, Horst Franck, Gert Froebe, Francoise Rosay.

results.title: Lazy Sunday afternoon
results.brief_description: In the desert a vulture enjoys the silence of a hot afternoon. The sudden appearance of a vehicle destroys the quiet of the day. Two pistoleros exit the car ready for a duel; our hero, the vulture, watches as the pistoleros take part in a very funny slow motion shoot-out.

results.title: Lay it on the line: a study in campaign fire management
results.brief_description: Through a lecture, to a group of firemen, and footage shot during an actual fire in California, the film explains what must be done by various people to contain fires of different sizes.

results.title: Laxton
results.creator_credit: AVC Productions and University of Hull
results.brief_description: The story of Laxton, a village in Nottinghamshire, and its evolution from Norman times, showing how strip farming operated. Shows how a medieval management system fits into the modern agricultural scene. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.

results.title: Lawn bowls
results.creator_credit: Don Smith and Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch
results.brief_description: Designed to introduce and teach the skills of lawn bowls. Introduces the game, how and where it is played, the equipment and clothing used and provides a demostration of play and scoring. The second half presents a comprehensive overview of the basic techniques required.

results.title: Laurel & Hardy Utopia
results.brief_description: Utopia is the final feature in the 25 year career of Laurel and Hardy who were known and loved throughout the world - without a doubt, the most the most successful and best loved comedy duo the world has ever known. In Utopia, Stan and Ollie get into yet `another fine mess’ when they inherit a Pacific island and to everyone’s surprise discover Uranium.

results.title: Laura's pregnant!
results.creator_credit: Deane Hutton, Jean Anne DeVoe and Queen Victoria Hospital Foundation
results.brief_description: Laura’s pregnant! follows 16 year old Laura as she discovers she is pregnant and reflects back on how it all happened, the myths her pregnancy refutes and how she and the baby’s father deal with the situation emotionally and the dilemmas they face. The program briefly explores her options of termination, adoption, marriage and single parenting, without revealing which decision she chooses. A teacher’s guide accompanies the video and provides activities around each section of the tape as well as an extensive bibliography. Suitable for lower and middle secondary school students.

results.title: Late at night
results.creator_credit: Michael C. Chorlton, Bruton Film Studios and Nettlefold Studios
results.brief_description: A London reporter investigates an organised crime ring. Stars Barry Morse; Noel Dryden; Daphne Day; Paul Demel; John Rae; Frank Atkinson; Dennis Harkin; Clifford Cobbe; Ben Williams; Claire Smith; Bill Holland; and Beryl Trent. Story and screenplay by Henry C. James; song ‘Late at Night’ by Arthur Young; musical direction by Arthur Young.

results.title: Last stands: Tasmania
results.creator_credit: Phil Lohrey, David Woodhall and Island Films
results.brief_description: The last stands of temperate rainforests in Tasmania. Examines the issues of the geology of the forest, the problems posed by hydroelectric schemes and logging operations.
